title: Biden Promises to Push Voting, Policing Changes During SC State Speech
sub_head: President hands a diploma to Democratic Rep. Jim Clyburn, who didn’t march in his own graduation from the university
body:
President Biden said Friday during a commencement address at South Carolina State University that he would continue to work on getting legislation to overhaul policing and voting rules through Congress after both efforts stalled this year.
Democrats have made a renewed push this week for voting legislation. Bills passed by the House earlier this year haven’t advanced in the 50-50 Senate, where 60 votes are needed to move most legislation and Republicans are opposed, saying election laws should be left to states.
